    • Constructor Detail

      • University

        public University()

        University

        Description: Constructs a new University object. This constructor initializes the array of professors with a fixed size of 50.

        Preconditions:

        • None: No preconditions.

        Postconditions:

        • A new University object is created with an array of professors initialized to a size of 50.

    • Method Detail

      • registerProfessor

        public java.lang.String registerProfessor(int intProfType,
                                          java.lang.String firstName,
                                          java.lang.String lastName,
                                          java.lang.String id,
                                          double baseSalary,
                                          double bonus,
                                          int extraHours,
                                          int workedHours)

        registerProfessor

        Description: Registers a professor based on the provided information. This method checks for duplicate professors with the same first and last name using the searchProf(String, String) method. If there is a duplicate professor, it returns a message indicating that the professor has already been registered. If there is no duplicate, it checks for available space to register a new professor using the availableProf() method. If there is no available space, it returns a message indicating that no more professors can be registered. If space is available, it creates a new instance of the appropriate type of professor (full-time or hourly) based on the provided type and initializes it with the provided information. The newly created professor is then added to the array of professors.

        Preconditions:

        • intProfType must be 1 or 2 (as an int)
        • professors array must be initialized.
        • Both the searchProf and availableProf methods should be in place.

        Postconditions:

        • A professor is registered based on the provided information, and a message indicating the success or failure of the registration is returned.
        Parameters:
        intProfType - The type of professor (1 for full-time, 2 for hourly).
        firstName - The first name of the professor.
        lastName - The last name of the professor.
        id - The ID of the professor.
        baseSalary - The base salary of the professor.
        bonus - The bonus (applicable for full-time professors only).
        extraHours - The extra hours (applicable for full-time professors only).
        workedHours - The worked hours (applicable for hourly professors only).
        Returns:
        A message indicating the success or failure of the registration.

      • searchProf

        public boolean searchProf(java.lang.String firstName,
                          java.lang.String lastName)

        searchProf

        Description: Searches for a professor with the specified first and last name. This method iterates through the array of professors stored in the univesity and checks if there is a professor with the provided first and last name. If a professor with matching first and last names is found, it sets the flag existProfessor to true; otherwise, it remains false.

        Preconditions:

        • professors array must be initialized.

        Postconditions:

        • A boolean value indicating whether a professor with the specified first and last name exists or not is returned.
        Parameters:
        firstName - The first name of the professor to search for.
        lastName - The last name of the professor to search for.
        Returns:
        boolean informing if a professor with the specified first and last name exists.

      • availableProf

        public int availableProf()

        availableProf

        Description: Finds the index of the first available slot in the professors array to register a new professor. This method iterates through the array of professors stored in the controller and returns the index of the first null element, indicating an available slot to register a new professor. If no available slot is found, it returns -1.

        Preconditions:

        • professors array must be initialized.

        Postconditions:

        • The index of the first available slot to register a new professor is returned.
        Returns:
        The index of the first available slot to register a new professor, or -1 if no slot is available.

      • getProfessors

        public Professor[] getProfessors()

        getProfessors

        Description: Retrieves the array of professors. This method returns the array of professors stored in the University.

        Preconditions:

        • professors array must be initialized.

        Postconditions:

        • The array of professors is returned.
        Returns:
        The array of professors.
